statements: DELETE FROM counterparty_credit_risk WHERE credit_rating = 'A' AND exposure_limit < 50000.00;
DELETE FROM counterparty_credit_risk WHERE counterparty_id = 1001 AND credit_rating = 'AAA';
DELETE FROM exposure_limits WHERE counterparty_name = 'Company ABC';
DELETE FROM exposure_limits WHERE counterparty_name = 'ABC Corp' AND exposure_limit > 10000;
DELETE FROM counterparty_credit_ratings WHERE credit_rating = 'AA' AND date_updated = '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM counterparty_credit_ratings WHERE counterparty_id = 100 AND date_updated < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM ExposureLimit WHERE valid_to IS NOT NULL;
DELETE FROM ExposureLimit WHERE valid_from < '2022-01-01' AND exposure_limit < 10000;
